review: "Snail In The Woods" did not resonate with me as much as I had hoped. The illustrations were quite drab and not very engaging, which made it hard to connect with the story. While the concept of following a snail's life cycle is interesting, the execution felt somewhat flat and lacking in depth. It didn't capture the emotional or poetic elements that I usually look for in my reading. This book seems to be more of an educational tool rather than a deeply moving or beautifully crafted narrative.
